message: I just got an Apple TV and mostly use it for AirPlay streaming of videos and songs and also for Display mirroring my iPad 2 to play awesome games. And I love the Internet Radio section and the YouTube and vimeo!!

I have a jailbroken one with 3rd party software to stream video from my NAS, I use it mostly just for that alone.  I really don't like dealing with the remote for searching for Utube content, the streaming from my computer to tv via the atv seems cool but I have yet to use it.
